data.description:
# Welcome to the MasterRunners Page.

MasterRunners is a free-to-play multiplayer hand based movement game surrounding a variety of entertaining gamemodes, cosmetics, obstacles, etc.

With over **9+ gamemodes** and an **active player count of 100,000+**, we guarantee this game is worth your time. We have lots to offer, so what are you waiting for!?

# What you can do:

- Play Gamemodes with players across the **WORLD**. MasterRunners can be played worldwide and with our **advanced multiplayer system**, you can enjoy multiplayer & have a very fun time. For the gamemodes, we build special gamemodes that have never been used in others games making us stand out and more fun.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86601733_440204885645778_2463045873846786554_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qYX0_2dee0gQ7kNvgE_22Ap&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AKEFe2MTDUqMGrZXZKrPxHZ&oh=00_AYAUFUEGqONepjXCz4bQhJuXhwZUDFJzvvkNHfITCZCalQ&oe=66E2D40E)
- Chill with friends and have a **great time.** With areas such as the "Main Hub", you can relax and have a calming time with buddies as you talk to your hearts desire.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982492_509486201534965_7333984808768808414_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dzgt7te5wP0Q7kNvgEjmNAa&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AKEFe2MTDUqMGrZXZKrPxHZ&oh=00_AYB8z_NwPa7rDl40OfW0BxI7iqDwHVktLARf0W4xqk0ElA&oe=66E2BBA7)
- Shop for new cosmetics at Gregson's Shop with the free in-game currency... Energy! Using energy, you can get all kinds of cosmetics of any type just with one click. This is how you can customize your character!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982613_1216230169384631_6163698231671476667_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jywe7HlSqNAQ7kNvgFlO0yw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AKEFe2MTDUqMGrZXZKrPxHZ&oh=00_AYDlVn1osvg4073S6aiPd-nosdyaUhujmu7-Ts2A4dUsoA&oe=66E2B3F5)

- **Survive Monsters..**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974658_770419331698632_3320560763268773557_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Gcu4JrIMaXQQ7kNvgFqEFj9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AKEFe2MTDUqMGrZXZKrPxHZ&oh=00_AYBmFiazL4PJF_OlDu-WqoaamPF8C3OBBEH9zu6iSIetAg&oe=66E2C1E7)

And more. 

There is lots to do in MasterRunners, so check it out **TODAY!**
![{"height":760,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036658_346841081692752_5615313403274744634_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7U0H6UKZOPcQ7kNvgF_RvKR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AKEFe2MTDUqMGrZXZKrPxHZ&oh=00_AYCQK9CHivAh70MBTUaXYLhIGoFvGBbCZqkfb0FjhMPf5Q&oe=66E2D088)
